x.ink – FAQ

Some answers to frequently asked questions.

We know accounting is important to your business and we know x.ink is not perfect. Hopefully this page will help you find some of the answers you may have.

If there's anything else we can help with, please get in touch.

Does x.ink offer a free trial?

Yes, we offer a free 90 day trial for businesses operating in Australia. Simply install the app and start using it.
